com.intelligt.modbus.jlibmodbus.net.stream.base

Class ModbusInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.intelligt.modbus.jlibmodbus.net.stream.base.ModbusInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoggingInputStream

    public abstract class ModbusInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    extends the InputStream class with ModbusInputStream#readShortLE() and ModbusInputStream#readShortBE() methods. Also it allows to set max read operation time with ModbusInputStream#setReadTimeout() method.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    kochedykov

      Constructors

      ModbusInputStream()

      read two bytes in Big Endian Byte Order
      int readShortLE()
      read two bytes in Little Endian Byte Order
      abstract void setReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
      sets a timeout value. if there is a timeout of read operation a stream must throw new IO exception.

      • read

        public int read(byte[] b)
         throws java.io.IOException
        default implementation of reading of a byte array.
        Overrides:
        read in class java.io.InputStream
        Parameters:
        b - a byte array to fill by values from the input stream.
        Returns:
        total number of values read from the input stream into the byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a read operation timeout
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if b is null.

      • setReadTimeout

        public abstract void setReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
        sets a timeout value. if there is a timeout of read operation a stream must throw new IO exception.
        Parameters:
        readTimeout - is a timeout value in milliseconds

      • readShortBE

        public int readShortBE()
                throws java.io.IOException
        read two bytes in Big Endian Byte Order
        Returns:
        16-bit value placed in first two bytes of integer value, second two bytes is equal zero.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        readShortLE()

      • readShortLE

        public int readShortLE()
                throws java.io.IOException
        read two bytes in Little Endian Byte Order
        Returns:
        16-bit value placed in first two bytes of integer value, second two bytes is equal zero.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        readShortBE()
